alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 12 at 2:57AM AKST until November 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Water will inundate low lying areas. Large breaking waves will cause shoreline erosion and may impact fish racks and other structures near the beach. Some low lying roads and trails will be flooded. In Unalakleet, areas around the Unalakleet River and the AC Store will experience minor flooding. In Shaktoolik, the fresh water intake may be impacted by saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated water levels 2 to 5 feet above the normal high tide line are expected. Waves will push onshore, especially along south and west facing shores. Peak water levels will occur Monday night. Sustained southwest winds 25 to 35 mph Sunday evening will shift to the west Monday night.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
